monday.title: Kids Choir K-6
monday.description: Singers of all levels are welcome to join our Kids Choir. Kindergarten thru 6th grade. Reading ability is preffered but not mandatory.

monday.title: Rhythm Kids 7-12
monday.description: This fun filled class mixes jazz and world music, body percussion and song to learn different rhythms and musicality. Ages 7-12.

monday.title: Lyrical 1
monday.description: This contemporary dance form mixes jazz, ballet and creative dance… often telling a story through movement. No experience necessary.

monday.title: Lyrical 2
monday.description: Lyrical dance for students with 1 or more years of dance experience… instructor must approve admission for new students. Ages 8+.

monday.title: Lyrical 3
monday.description: This int/advanced lyrical class is by audition only for new students. Ages 12+.

tuesday.title: Intro 2 Music
tuesday.description: This class is primarily for Mt Shasta Children's Theatre students. However, it is open to all who would like to learn more about music… reading, writing and performing.

tuesday.title: Mt Shasta Children's Theatre Class
tuesday.description: Students in MSCT class will rehearse, perfect and perform two plays/musicals each season. All students will have a part in each play and will learn all aspects of putting on a show.

tuesday.title: Ballet 1.5
tuesday.description: A level up from Ballet 1. New students must be approved by the instructor before registering for this class.

tuesday.title: Ballet 2
tuesday.description: Tuesday class meets at the home studio. Thursday class meets at Studio 2. An intermediate Ballet Class by instructors approval only.

tuesday.title: Ballet 3
tuesday.description: By invitation only… this ballet class meets twice a week. Tuesdays with Sherri at the Home Studio, Thursdays with Amy at Studio 2 at Shasta Yoga.

wednesday.title: Irish Dance 6-9
wednesday.description: Students must have soft soled Ghillies for this class. They can be purchased through our online dancewear store. Ages 6-9.

wednesday.title: Irish Dance 10+
wednesday.description: Students in this class must purchase soft soled Ghillies. These traditional shoes are available on our online dancewear store. Ages 10+.

wednesday.title: Adult Ballet
wednesday.description: A technique based class for adults of all levels.

thursday.title: Intro 2 Music
thursday.description: This class is primarily for Mt Shasta Children's Theatre students. However, it is open to all who would like to learn more about music… reading, writing and performing.

thursday.title: Mt Shasta Children's Theatre Class
thursday.description: Students in MSCT class will rehearse, perfect and perform two plays/musicals each season. All students will have a part in each play and will learn all aspects of putting on a show.

thursday.title: Community Choir
thursday.description: Community Choir is a family-friendly musical celebration every week. Families will join together in song learning all types of music. No experience necessary. Special family rate $40 for the whole family. You need only register one family member then bring the rest!

thursday.title: Ballet 2
thursday.description: Tuesday class meets at the home studio. Thursday class meets at Studio 2 at Shasta Yoga. An intermediate Ballet Class by instructors approval only.

thursday.title: Ballet 3
thursday.description: By invitation only… this ballet class meets twice a week. Tuesdays with Sherri at the Home Studio, Thursdays with Amy at Studio 2 at Shasta Yoga.
